original_text: But if I did judge anyone, I would decide correctly what is right. That is because I am not alone. The Father has sent me, and he is with me.
korean_text: 만일 내가 판단하여도 내 판단이 참되니 이는 내가 혼자 있는 것이 아니요 나를 보내신 이가 나와 함께 계심이라

sentences.original_text: But if I did judge anyone
I would decide correctly what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 옳은 것을 올바르게 결정할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: That is because I am not alone
